pages.text: Using different types of ingredients to make a type of sushi will get you different effects to make your food better

pages.title: Small Bites
pages.text: Eating when having this potion effect will give you a small chance of not consuming the item.

pages.title: Acquired Taste
pages.text: Eating when having this potion effect will give extra food.

pages.title: Steady Hands
pages.text: Using a cutting board when having this potion effect will give extra weights in your ingredients.
